short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘀 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀! Add 𝘚𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘤𝘩 𝘦𝘉𝘢𝘺 to your right click menu today, click Add to Chrome now! 😊

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight any text to search eBay at the click of a mouse.

This simple and free extension adds a brand new "Search eBay" feature to your right click context menu.

- Compare prices
- Market Research
- Gather product info
- SAVE TIME!

NEW: Now supports all countries!
(𝘴𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘺 𝘤𝘭𝘪𝘤𝘬 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘦𝘹𝘵𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘪𝘤𝘰𝘯, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘦𝘭𝘦𝘤𝘵 𝘺𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘥𝘦𝘴𝘪𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘥𝘦𝘧𝘢𝘶𝘭𝘵 𝘤𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘵𝘳𝘺.)

𝗧𝗿𝘆 𝗶𝘁 𝗼𝘂𝘁, 𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗸 “𝗔𝗱𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗖𝗵𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗲” 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝘀𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗼𝘄! 😊
